description: Pan gets a brutal punishment from Ashton when he’s found smoking in the barracks It’s midnight and the cadet Pan Bash is secretly smoking a cigarette when his superior Ashton Bradley discovers him. He’s quickly ordered to do some pushups whilst he whips and pounds him in what seems one of the most brutal punishment we ever seen before. The cadet obeys whatever he ordered and after getting pissed in his mouth Ashton tells him to suck his cock. Once Ashton is turned on he bends Pan over and starts to pound his not-so-abused ass. After riding his superior’s cock the cadet is pissed by him and soon he is face-fucked until the soldier cums inside his mouth.
title: Boy Gets Punished for Smoking in the Barrack RAW
